í™ˆí˜ì´ì§€ : https://shobot.xyz
ë¸” ë¡œ ê·¸   : https://blog.naver.com/shobot_official

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

This program assists the work of shopping mall operators (especially purchasing agents). It collects shopping mall purchase information and sends it to Database, and receives information from Firebase to perform functions such as consultation and delivery agency registration.

Currently, functions such as AI consultation function and order information collection at some shopping malls (Smart Store, Taobao, Ably, ZigZag, etc.) are implemented. It is continuously being updated.

âœ¨ The order linking function has been updated!
âœ¨ The UI has been significantly updated with a side site panel for easier viewing!
âœ¨ Information search is now possible by linking with Cafe24, CJ Delivery, and Unipass!
